plot outline: Captain Rajaram, a retired army officer, continues to fight against corruption and terrorism. But the tale takes a twist when an honest police officer opposes his cause. This altercation paves the way in unearthing a huge conspiracy. Will Captain Rajaram succeed?
title: Rajatantra
plot: Captain Rajaram, a retired army officer, continues to fight against corruption and terrorism. But the tale takes a twist when an honest police officer opposes his cause. This altercation paves the way in unearthing a huge conspiracy. Will Captain Rajaram succeed?
